edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.game.alva.Graphics

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.game.alva.Graphics.Animation

  • public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
    Enables movement from Entity objects and appends texture objects for frame behavior

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Animation(java.util.ArrayList<Texture> textures, int delay)
      Creates a frame for Texture objects to be copied into textureList ArrayList
      Animation(int delay)
      Creates an instance of ArrayList of type Texture, sets inital position and timer to zero, and sets the initial delay of Animation object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFrame(Texture t)
      Adds texture objects into textureList
      void addFrame(Texture t, int pos)
      Adds texture object into specific index in textureList
      void animate(Entity e, java.awt.Graphics2D win)
      Enables Entity objects or objects that extend Entity class to move
      java.util.ArrayList<Texture> getFrames()
      Gets the textureList ArrayList for further usage

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Animation

        public Animation(int delay)
        Creates an instance of ArrayList of type Texture, sets inital position and timer to zero, and sets the initial delay of Animation object
        Parameters:
        delay - passes value of type int to set initial delay of Animation object

      • Animation

        public Animation(java.util.ArrayList<Texture> textures,
                 int delay)
        Creates a frame for Texture objects to be copied into textureList ArrayList
        Parameters:
        textures - passes ArrayList object that is type Texture to copy Texture objects into textureList
        delay - passes value of type int to set initial delay of Animation object

    • Method Detail

      • addFrame

        public void addFrame(Texture t)
        Adds texture objects into textureList
        Parameters:
        t - passes object of type Texture that will be appended to textureList

      • addFrame

        public void addFrame(Texture t,
                     int pos)
        Adds texture object into specific index in textureList
        Parameters:
        t - passes object of type Texture that will be appended to textureList
        pos - the specific index passed in objects will be placed in within the textureList ArrayList object

      • getFrames

        public java.util.ArrayList<Texture> getFrames()
        Gets the textureList ArrayList for further usage
        Returns:
        textureList ArrayList with texture objects appended or empty

      • animate

        public void animate(Entity e,
                    java.awt.Graphics2D win)
        Enables Entity objects or objects that extend Entity class to move
        Parameters:
        e - passes object of type Entity for so objects can move; can pass objects that extend Entity
        win - Graphics2D object that represents the window object for drawing to a GUI
